keyMoments.title: Training at Marine Headquarters
keyMoments.description: Koby performs menial labor and chores as part of his basic training at Marine Headquarters under Garp's supervision.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Koby's dedication to his Marine dream and willingness to start from the bottom.

keyMoments.title: Discussing Friendship with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Koby reflects on how meeting Luffy changed his life and inspired him to pursue his dream of becoming a Marine.
keyMoments.significance: Reinforces Luffy's lasting impact on Koby and their continuing bond despite being on opposite sides.
keyMoments.quote: Meeting Luffy changed everything for me. He inspired me to chase my dream.

keyMoments.title: Fighting Garp to Prove Resolve
keyMoments.description: Koby fights Vice Admiral Garp alongside Helmeppo to prove his mental fortitude and dedication to becoming a Marine.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Koby's courage to face impossible odds and his growth from the timid boy who first met Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Accepted as Garp's Trainee
keyMoments.description: After proving his mental resolve, Koby is officially accepted as Vice Admiral Garp's personal trainee.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the mentorship relationship that will transform Koby into a powerful Marine and eventual SWORD member.

reveals.information: Considers Luffy a friend and source of inspiration despite being on opposite sides

relationships.description: Koby credits Luffy with inspiring him to pursue his Marine dream and changing his life.

evolutionMoments.description: Koby discusses with Helmeppo how Luffy's influence continues to motivate him.

relationships.description: Koby becomes Garp's official trainee after proving his mental resolve.

evolutionMoments.description: Garp accepts Koby as his personal trainee after testing his resolve.

relationships.description: Koby and Helmeppo train together and support each other in their Marine journey.

evolutionMoments.description: They discuss their shared inspiration from Luffy and fight Garp together.

keyMoments.title: Complaining About Chores
keyMoments.description: Helmeppo complains about having to do menial chores but continues working diligently alongside Koby.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Helmeppo's continued character growth - he complains but perseveres, unlike his former spoiled self.
keyMoments.quote: How is doing chores going to make me a Marine?

keyMoments.title: Acknowledging Luffy's Influence
keyMoments.description: Helmeppo discusses with Koby how meeting Luffy changed their lives, showing gratitude for the pirate's impact.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Helmeppo's transformation from antagonist to someone who appreciates those who helped him grow.

keyMoments.title: Fighting Garp Alongside Koby
keyMoments.description: Helmeppo fights Vice Admiral Garp to prove his resolve and dedication to becoming a strong Marine.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Helmeppo's courage and his willingness to face overwhelming challenges for his dream.

keyMoments.title: Accepted as Garp's Trainee
keyMoments.description: Helmeppo is officially accepted as Vice Admiral Garp's personal trainee after demonstrating mental fortitude.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Helmeppo's serious Marine training that will eventually make him a capable fighter.

reveals.information: Shows continued growth from spoiled brat to dedicated Marine trainee

relationships.description: Helmeppo becomes Garp's official trainee after proving his mental resolve.

evolutionMoments.description: Garp accepts Helmeppo as his personal trainee after testing his resolve.

relationships.description: Helmeppo and Koby train together and support each other in their Marine journey.

evolutionMoments.description: They discuss their shared inspiration from Luffy and fight Garp together.

keyMoments.title: Watching Over Trainees
keyMoments.description: Garp observes Koby and Helmeppo from a distance, motivating them through his presence to work harder.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Garp's unique mentorship style of teaching through observation and subtle motivation.

keyMoments.title: Overhearing Discussion About Luffy
keyMoments.description: Garp secretly listens to Koby and Helmeppo discussing their friendship with Luffy, showing no reaction despite being Luffy's grandfather.
keyMoments.significance: Subtle foreshadowing of Garp's familial connection to Luffy, which won't be revealed until Episode 314.

keyMoments.title: Testing Koby and Helmeppo's Resolve
keyMoments.description: Garp challenges Koby and Helmeppo to a fight on the beach to test their mental fortitude and dedication.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Garp's philosophy that mental strength matters more than physical power in determining a Marine's worth.

keyMoments.title: Accepting New Trainees
keyMoments.description: Garp officially accepts Koby and Helmeppo as his personal trainees after they prove their mental resolve.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the mentorship that will transform both into powerful Marines, with Koby eventually becoming a hero of the Marines.
keyMoments.quote: I was testing your mental power. You are going to be trained under my supervision.

reveals.information: Values mental fortitude over physical strength when evaluating Marines
Uses unconventional methods like observation and combat tests to mentor trainees

relationships.description: Garp takes Koby under his wing as a personal trainee, seeing potential in his mental resolve.

evolutionMoments.description: Garp officially accepts Koby as his trainee after testing his resolve.

relationships.description: Garp takes Helmeppo under his wing as a personal trainee alongside Koby.

evolutionMoments.description: Garp officially accepts Helmeppo as his trainee after testing his resolve.

relationships.description: Bogard serves as Garp's right-hand man and trusted companion.

keyMoments.title: Observing Training
keyMoments.description: Bogard silently observes the training and testing of Koby and Helmeppo throughout the episode.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Bogard as a recurring presence in the training arc and reinforces his role as Garp's trusted companion.

relationships.description: Serves as Garp's right-hand man and loyal companion.

keyMoments.title: Upset About Koby and Helmeppo Leaving
keyMoments.description: Rika throws a tantrum upon learning that Koby and Helmeppo have left Shells Town for Marine Headquarters.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the emotional impact Koby and Helmeppo had on the residents of Shells Town and their growth as people.

reveals.information: Has formed a bond with Koby and Helmeppo during their time in Shells Town

relationships.description: Rika befriended Koby and became upset when he left for Marine Headquarters.

evolutionMoments.description: Rika's emotional reaction to Koby's departure shows how much she values their friendship.

keyMoments.title: Comforting Rika
keyMoments.description: Ririka comforts her daughter Rika by assuring her that Koby and Helmeppo will return someday as distinguished Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the positive impact Koby and Helmeppo had on Shells Town and foreshadows their future success.

relationships.description: Ririka is Rika's mother and protects her.
